channel.title: Basic Information on
channel.description: Recent content in Basic Information on

item.title: View Workspace Basic Information
item.description:
This section explains how to view workspace basic information.

Prerequisites

You should be a member of a workspace. For more information, refer to Workspace Members and Workspace Roles.

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console and navigate to your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Basic Info in the left navigation pane.

    The Basic Information page provides the following information:

    Parameter Description

    Workspace Information

item.title: Edit Workspace Information
item.description:
This section explains how to edit workspace information.

You can edit the alias and description of the workspace. KubeSphere does not support editing the name of a workspace that has already been created.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Settings Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Settings Management permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Basic Info in the left navigation pane.

  3. In the Workspace Information area, select Manage > Edit Information from the top right corner.

  4. In the Edit Information dialog, set the alias and description for the workspace, then click OK.

    Parameter Description

    Alias

item.title: Delete Workspaces
item.description:
This section provides guidance on deleting a workspace.

Warning

Deleting a workspace is irreversible. If you choose to delete projects within the workspace, all projects and their resources within the workspace will also be deleted. Please proceed with caution.

Prerequisites

You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Settings Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".
